title: The Adventures of the Little Prince
description: This story is about a young prince who wants to have a grand adventure, more than learning how to be a king. Very early one morning, he leaves the castle and sets off on his first adventure. On the way, he meets gypsies, a ‘witch’ who is really a lonely old lady, a young maiden who needs help, and a man whose horse has run away. The young prince finds many opportunities to help others and discovers that he has the qualities to become a great king after all.
author: Rosemary R. Evans
